mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin_applications (user_id, status, reason, feedback, processor_id, created_at, processed_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{status}, #{reason}, #{feedback}, #{processorId}, #{createdAt}, #{processedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM admin_applications WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'PENDING'
SELECT aa.*, u.username, u.email, u.nickname FROM admin_applications aa JOIN users u ON aa.user_id = u.id WHERE aa.status = 'PENDING' LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM admin_applications WHERE status = 'PENDING'
SELECT * FROM admin_applications WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
